Kusama Terminal
Kusama is a canary network for Polkadot. The network has real economic condtions, so aspects like governance and staking can be more accurately tested.

This site provides a peak into the network with a live feed of blocks. The design is inspired by the look and feel of a linux terminal with the twist of static disruption.

To explain a few of the block values:
  • Block number: the height of the block. The latest block has a height equal to the chain height.
  • Author: Account ID of the block creator.
  • Time stamp: the time at which the block was produced.
